books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: Lalit Gour
books.description: A novel about a disenchanted teenager named Holden Caulfield. Would You Like To Travel With Me ?

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Suprabho Saha
books.description: A classic novel set in the American South during the 1930s. I'm Tired Of Watching Television.

books.author: Kunal Singla
books.description: A dystopian novel depicting a totalitarian society. That's The Absolute Truth.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Arya Lanjewar
books.description: A classic novel exploring themes of love, class, and society. You Were Late, Weren't You ?

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: Single Kunal
books.description: A novel set during the Roaring Twenties in the United States. Oh, How I'd Love To Go!
